places.title: Salt Lake Temple
places.address: 50 N Temple, Salt Lake City, UT 84150, USA
places.description: The Salt Lake Temple, dedicated in 1893, is the most iconic temple of the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints.

places.title: Nauvoo Illinois Temple
places.address: 50 North Wells Street, Nauvoo, IL 62354, USA
places.description: A reconstruction of the original temple built in the 1840s, the Nauvoo Temple stands as a symbol of faith and history.

places.title: Mesa Arizona Temple
places.description: The Mesa Temple is well known for its beautiful Easter Pageant and visitor-friendly grounds.

places.title: Rome Italy Temple
places.description: The Rome Temple is a cultural and religious landmark, dedicated in 2019 with statues of the original Twelve Apostles nearby.

places.title: Accra Ghana Temple
places.description: The Accra Ghana Temple was the first temple built in West Africa, dedicated in 2004.

places.title: Johannesburg South Africa Temple
places.address: LDS Temple Complex, 3 Jubilee Rd, Parktown, Johannesburg, South Africa
places.description: The Johannesburg Temple was the first temple built in Africa, dedicated in 1985.

places.title: Paris France Temple
places.description: Located near Versailles, the Paris Temple is known for its peaceful gardens and cultural beauty.

places.title: Hong Kong China Temple
places.address: 2 Cornwall Street, Kowloon Tong, Hong Kong
places.description: Dedicated in 1996, the Hong Kong Temple is a central place of worship for members across Asia.
